description:
Learning to speak a foreign language is like going on a diet. At first, you can’t wait to get started! You tell yourself that in a few years, or maybe even months, you’ll be conversing with the locals! You’re ready to learn! You might even spend hundreds of dollars on books or expensive language courses.

Then it happens. You realize learning a language is not as easy as you thought. Your expensive learning course or collage classes are putting you to sleep. After a few weeks, the flame slowly dies out. All your hard work and money starts to go to waste.

You’re not alone. Many of us hit a roadblock when learning to speak a new language.

Learning a language on your own can be difficult (and sometimes boring). But now, it doesn’t have to be!

Whether you are looking for a new way to learn or simply want to increase your knowledge of German, there is a course for you. All advanced beginners can re-ignite their desire to learn with this comprehensive online video course!

Join the more than one hundred students who have found success while using this entertaining and interactive course. These engaging videos and exercises are the perfect way to engage your mind without breaking your wallet.

In addition to video lectures, you will have plenty of exercises to help you gain a better understanding of the German language. Instead of learning a bunch of phrases, focus on the very building blocks of language, such as grammar. Easy, yet in-depth exercises will give you important knowledge you need to continue on your path to fluency. Our goal is to help you to be able to construct advanced sentences in German by the end of the course.

Lectures are easy to follow along with and not as complicated as other courses. Fun and engaging exercises will make learning fun again instead of a chore.

Whether you are self-taught or taking classes, this course can only help improve your overall knowledge of the language.

NOTE: This course is intended for those who already have a basic understanding of the German language.
title: Push your German to the next level
